#include <stdio.h>

int NearPowerOf2( int n ) {
	
	int p;
	
	for( p = 1; p < n;p *= 2 );
	
	return ( p / 2 );
}

int main(void) {
	
	int t, n, v;
	
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {

		scanf("%d", &n );
		
		if( ( n & ( n - 1 ) ) == 0 )
			printf("1\n");
		else {
	
			v = NearPowerOf2( n );
			printf("%d\n", 2*( n - v ) +  1 );
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
